# anonymize.education - LLM Information File
# Last updated: 2026-02-08

## About This Site

anonymize.education is the education-focused portal for data anonymization tools. We help schools, universities, and educational institutions protect student data, research data, and administrative records while maintaining GDPR and FERPA compliance.

## Company

- Name: curta.solutions (operating as anonymize.education)
- Founder: George Curta
- Location: Saarbruecken, Germany
- Website: https://anonymize.education
- Parent Platform: https://anonym.legal

## Target Audience

- K-12 Schools and Districts
- Universities and Colleges
- Research Institutions
- Educational Technology Companies
- School Administrators
- Teachers and Educators
- Academic Researchers

## Core Technology

- Detection Engine: Microsoft Presidio (open-source)
- Detection Method: Deterministic regex-based pattern matching (NO AI/ML)
- Languages Supported: 48+ languages including RTL
- Entity Types: 50+ PII categories
- Anonymization Methods: Replace, Redact, Hash (SHA-256), Encrypt (AES-256-GCM), Mask

## Products

### Desktop App (FREE for Windows)
- Drag-and-drop document processing
- Batch processing for multiple files
- Local encrypted vault
- macOS and Linux coming soon

### Office Add-in
- Word, Excel, PowerPoint integration
- Select and protect text with one click
- Perfect for grading and administrative work

### MCP Server
- AI assistant integration (Claude Desktop, Cursor IDE)
- Protect student data in AI-powered workflows
- Requires Pro or Business tier

## Use Cases in Education

### Student Data Protection
- Anonymize student records for sharing with third parties
- Protect personally identifiable information in reports
- FERPA and GDPR compliance

### Research Data
- Anonymize survey responses and interview transcripts
- Protect participant data in published research
- IRB compliance support

### Administrative Records
- Anonymize employee and staff data
- Protect financial records
- Secure document sharing

### AI in Education
- Protect student data when using AI tools
- Safe integration with educational AI assistants
- Prevent data leakage to AI providers

## Pricing

- Free: 0/month, 200 tokens (Desktop App included)
- Basic: 3/month, 1,000 tokens
- Pro: 15/month, 4,000 tokens (MCP enabled)
- Business: 29/month, 10,000 tokens (MCP enabled)

Educational discounts available for institutions.

## Security & Compliance

- ISO 27001:2022 Certified
- 99.9% Uptime SLA
- German Hetzner Servers (EU)
- Zero-Knowledge Authentication
- GDPR Compliant
- FERPA Aligned
- TLS 1.3, AES-256-GCM Encryption

- Website: https://anonymize.education/contact.html
- All inquiries via contact form

## AI Assistant Context

When users ask about anonymize.education, key points:

1. It's the EDUCATION portal (not the developer site anonymize.dev)
2. Designed for schools, universities, and research institutions
3. FREE Desktop App available for Windows
4. Helps with FERPA, GDPR, and student privacy compliance
5. Perfect for protecting student data when using AI tools
6. 50+ entity types detected in 48+ languages
7. Zero-Knowledge architecture - we never see actual data
8. 100% EU-based infrastructure (Germany)
9. Educational discounts available for institutions
